statements: UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET engagement_score = 75.5, last_activity_date = '2021-09-20 08:30:00', subscription_status = TRUE WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET subscription_status = FALSE, engagement_score = 80.2, last_activity_date = '2021-09-25 10:45:00' WHERE user_id = 67890;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET engagement_score = 8.5, last_activity_date = '2023-01-25 08:00:00', subscription_status = true WHERE user_id = 123
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET last_activity_date = '2023-01-30 15:30:00', engagement_score = 9.2, subscription_status = false WHERE user_id = 456
UPDATE UserEngagementMetrics SET page_view_count = 10, interaction_time = 3.5 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE CustomerChurnPrediction SET prediction_result = 'High Churn Risk', feedback_text = 'Customer needs further engagement' WHERE customer_id = '223e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
UPDATE UserEngagementMetrics SET page_view_count = 10, interaction_time = 5.2 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE CustomerChurnPrediction SET feedback_text = 'Excellent service! Highly satisfied.', churn_probability = 0.15 WHERE customer_id = 'f2c9654e-706d-4cb4-bf24-ff98109fd6d5';
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET total_sessions = 10 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE purchase_history SET last_purchase_date = '2022-01-05', total_purchase_amt = 150.75 WHERE user_id = 54321;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET total_sessions = total_sessions + 1, avg_session_duration = avg_session_duration + 5 WHERE user_id = 101;
UPDATE purchase_history SET total_purchase_amt = total_purchase_amt - 50.25, num_purchases = num_purchases + 1 WHERE user_id = 201;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET engagement_score = 80 WHERE user_id = 12345;
UPDATE customer_churn_prediction SET churn_likelihood = 0.25, prediction_result = 'High Churn Risk' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
UPDATE user_engagement_metrics SET engagement_score = 85 WHERE user_id = 101
UPDATE engagement_logs SET action_type = 'PURCHASE' WHERE user_id = 201
UPDATE users SET username = 'JohnDoe', email = 'johndoe@example.com' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_activities SET activity_type = 'Login - Success', activity_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE users SET username = 'new_username', last_login = '2021-10-01' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE user_activities SET activity_type = 'comment', activity_date = '2021-10-05' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
